LanguageData.DutyTally_WorkloadTip: How busy this pawn is. Can be a simple job count or weighted by priority. The weighting method and range can be configured in the mod settings.
LanguageData.DutyTally_IgnoreInvisibleWorkTypesTip: Tick this box to ignore jobs you don't normally see in the work tab (like 'Finish Off' from Allow Tool) when figuring out the workload.
LanguageData.DutyTally_UseWeightedPrioritiesTip: Tick this box to score workload based on priority. The exact weighting depends on the 'Max priority for weighting' setting below. Leave it unchecked for a simple job count.
LanguageData.DutyTally_MaxPriorityForWeightingTip: Set the highest priority number (e.g., 1, 2, 3, 4...) that should receive a distinct weight. Priorities 1 through this number will get decreasing weights (e.g., if set to 4, P1=3, P2=2, P3=1, P4=1). The weight is calculated as Max(1, SettingValue - Priority). Any priority number higher than this setting will also receive a weight of 1. Default is 4.
